name: Fir's Great Adventure
description:
BEWARE there are still tons of glitches I am working on!

Controls

Arrows to move/ WASD keys

Mouse to look around

Left to interact with things

Fir is a robot that has crash landed , because a bad lighting storm. Now he must explore the world and help characters along the way! By helping he fines what he needs to repair his ship to get back to space! No telling what might happen with Fir's Great Adventure!
